name: Shipwreck button escape
description:
This is a game where you end up on a desert island and try to survive and escape. 

You must manage you stocks of food, water, etc to survive. 

It was a tiny game a made to become familiar with dart language, it mainly consist in clicking buttons.  It's the first game I upload so don't hesitate to tell me if there is a bug of if I made a mistake (or even if you liked it :p).

I hope you enjoy it :)
